name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot (from SortingHat profile).

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender, based on her name, from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: author_gender_acc
description: Author gender accuracy from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: author_id
description: Author Id from SortingHat.

name: author_name
description: Author name from SortingHat.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name from SortingHat.

name: author_user_name
description: Author user name from SortingHat.

name: author_username
description: Author user name from GitLab.

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: code_merge_duration
description: Code merge duration.

name: closed_at
description: Date when the merge request was closed.

name: created_at
description: Merge Request creation date.

name: gitlab_repo
description: GitLab repository name.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Merge Request creation date.

name: id
description: Merge Request Id in GiLab.

name: id_in_repo
description: Merge Request Id in the repository it belongs to.

name: is_gitlab_merge_request
description: 1 indicating this is a Merge Request, used for counting in case other kind of items could be stored in the same index or alias.

name: item_type
description: Item type, in this case 'merge_request request'

name: labels
description: Merge Request assigned labels.

name: merged_at
description: Date when the merge request was merged,

name: merge_author_login
description: Merge author login from GitLab.

name: merge_author_domain
description: Merge author domain from GitLab.

name: merge_author_location
description: Merge author location from GitLab.

name: merge_author_name
description: Merge author name from GitLab.

name: merge_author_org
description: Merge author organization from GitLab.

name: merge_request
description: True if it is a Merge Request (useful to identify Merge Requests if used through aliases including several sources).

name: merged
description: True if the Merge Request was already merged.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: milestone
description: Assigned milestone.

name: milestone_start_date
description: Date when a milestone was started.

name: milestone_due_date
description: Date when a milestone was due.

name: milestone_url
description: URL of the milestone.

name: milestone_id
description: Id of the milestone, unique for all GitLab.

name: milestone_iid
description: Id of the milestone, unique for the GitLab repository.

name: num_notes
description: Number of notes.

name: num_versions
description: Number of versions

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: project
description: Project.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: repository
description: Repository name.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: solved_at
description: Date when the merge request was merged or closed.

name: state
description: 'merged', 'opened' or 'closed'.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: time_open_days
description: Time from MR creation to either closure or last update, in days. It applies to merged, closed and open MRs. If the MR is not open, the value will be the same as time_to_close_days. If the MR is open, the value is only updated when the MR changes, which can lead to inaccuracy.

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time from MR creation to closure, in days. It only applies to merged or closed MRs, should not be available if the status is open.

name: time_to_first_attention
description: Time from creation to first comment or reaction (whatever occurs first) added by an author different from the one who created this Merge Request.

name: title
description: Merge Request title.

name: title_analyzed
description: Merge Request title split by terms to allow searching.

name: updated_at
description: Date when the Merge Request was updated.

name: url
description: Merge Request URL

name: url_id
description: Consists of project path and Merge Request id in that project.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
